title: Ranjan produced before Special Presidential Commission
content: The Commissioner General of Prisons was directed to produce former MP Ranjan Ramanayake, who is currently in remand, to the Special Presidential Commission’s of Investigation on Thursday (17).President’s Counsel Thisath Wijegunawardena, the Legal Secretary of SJB stated Ramanayake was interrogated regarding certain facts mentioned in the ‘Upali Abeyratne’ commission report and added that the interrogation will continue for two more days.
